mapper.select: SELECT SESSION_ID as sessionId, MEMBER_ID as memberId, TOKEN as token, LOGIN_IP as loginIp, LOGIN_TIME as loginTime, EXPIRE_TIME as expireTime FROM LOGIN_SESSION WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGIN_SESSION ( SESSION_ID, -- 시퀀스로 자동 생성 MEMBER_ID, -- 회원 ID TOKEN, -- JWT 토큰 LOGIN_IP, -- 로그인 IP LOGIN_TIME, -- 현재 시간 (SYSDATE) EXPIRE_TIME -- 토큰 만료 시간 ) VALUES ( SESSION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{token}, #{loginIp}, SYSDATE, #{expireTime} )
